com.logitopia.jmortar.core.object.annotation

Interface AnnotationSearcher

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SpringAnnotationSearcher

    public interface AnnotationSearcher
    An searcher that will look through the runtime to find classes that contain an annotation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.lang.Class annotation)
      Search for a given annotation in the classes present at runtime.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.lang.Class annotation, java.lang.Class without)
      Search for a given annotation in the classes present at runtime.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.util.List<java.lang.Class> annotations)
      Search for a list of given annotations in the classes present at runtime.
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.util.List<java.lang.Class> annotations, java.util.List<java.lang.Class> without)
      Search for a list of given annotations in the classes present at runtime.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchClassForAnnotatedFieldNames(java.lang.Class annotation, java.lang.Class clazzToSearch)
      Search for a list of field names that are annotated with a given annotation.
      java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> searchClassForAnnotatedFields(java.lang.Class annotation, java.lang.Class clazzToSearch)
      Search for a list of fields that are annotated with a given annotation.

    • Method Detail

      • search

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.lang.Class annotation)
                                throws InvalidAnnotationException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Search for a given annotation in the classes present at runtime.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to find.
        Returns:
        A list of the classes that contain that annotation.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the model class attached to the annotation does not appear to be valid.

      • search

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                       java.lang.Class without)
                                throws InvalidAnnotationException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Search for a given annotation in the classes present at runtime. In this method count out the results that contain the given annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to find.
        without - An annotation that we filter results by.
        Returns:
        A list of the classes that contain that annotation.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the model class attached to the annotation does not appear to be valid.

      • search

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.util.List<java.lang.Class> annotations)
                                throws InvalidAnnotationException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Search for a list of given annotations in the classes present at runtime.
        Parameters:
        annotations - The annotations to find.
        Returns:
        A list of classes that contain the given annotations.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the model class attached to the annotation does not appear to be valid.

      • search

        java.util.List<java.lang.Class> search(java.util.List<java.lang.Class> annotations,
                                       java.util.List<java.lang.Class> without)
                                throws InvalidAnnotationException,
                                       java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Search for a list of given annotations in the classes present at runtime. In this method count out the results that contain the given annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotations - The annotations to find.
        without - Annotations we will filter results by.
        Returns:
        A list of classes that contain the given annotations.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - when the model class attached to the annotation does not appear to be valid.

      • searchClassForAnnotatedFields

        java.util.List<java.lang.reflect.Field> searchClassForAnnotatedFields(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                      java.lang.Class clazzToSearch)
                                                               throws InvalidAnnotationException
        Search for a list of fields that are annotated with a given annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to find.
        clazzToSearch - The class to search for the listed annotation.
        Returns:
        A list of fields that are contained within the given class that are annotated with the provided annotation.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException

      • searchClassForAnnotatedFieldNames

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> searchClassForAnnotatedFieldNames(java.lang.Class annotation,
                                                                   java.lang.Class clazzToSearch)
                                                            throws InvalidAnnotationException
        Search for a list of field names that are annotated with a given annotation.
        Parameters:
        annotation - The annotation to find.
        clazzToSearch - The class to search for the listed annotation.
        Returns:
        A list of field names that are contained within the given class that are annotated with the provided annotation.
        Throws:
        InvalidAnnotationException
